data.eml:eml: The identity of the semiterrestrial crab Terrathelphusa kuchingensis (Nobili, 1901) (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura: Gecarcinucidae), with descriptions of four new species from southwestern Sarawak, Borneo, Malaysia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grinang, Jongkar, Ng, Peter K. L. (2015): The identity of the semiterrestrial crab Terrathelphusa kuchingensis (Nobili, 1901) (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura: Gecarcinucidae), with descriptions of four new species from southwestern Sarawak, Borneo, Malaysia. Zootaxa 3946 (3): 331-346, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3946.3.2
